typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		account_resp_me as string,
		account_resp_pi as string,
		account_status as string,
		client_lost_reason as string,
		company_email as string,
		company_id as long,
		company_name as string,
		company_owner_full_name as string,
		gard_contact_id as string,
		market_area_code as string,
		market_area_description as string,
		parent_company_id as long,
		parent_company_name as string,
		paris_gic_id as long,
		primary_contact_email as string,
		primary_contact_name as string,
		source_system as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select 		account_resp_me,\n		account_resp_pi,\n		account_status,\n		client_lost_reason,\n		company_email,\n		company_id,\n		company_name,\n		company_owner_full_name,\n		gard_contact_id,\n		 market_area_code,\n		 market_area_description,\n		parent_company_id,\n		parent_company_name,\n                paris_gic_id,\n		primary_contact_email,\n		primary_contact_name,\n		source_system from dwh_stage.sf_company_new\nwhere company_name is not null\nand company_id is not null',
	format: 'query') ~> SfCompanyNew
SfCompanyNew select(mapColumn(
		account_resp_me,
		account_resp_pi,
		account_status,
		client_lost_reason,
		company_email,
		company_id,
		company_name,
		company_owner_full_name,
		gard_contact_id,
		gard_market_area_code = market_area_code,
		gard_market_area_desc = market_area_description,
		parent_company_id,
		parent_company_name,
		source_system_id = paris_gic_id,
		primary_contact_email,
		primary_contact_name,
		source_system
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RelevantColumns
RelevantColumns aggregate(groupBy(company_id,
		source_system,
		source_system_id),
	each(match(name!='company_id' && name!='source_system' && name!='source_system_id'), $$ = max($$))) ~> Deduplicate
Deduplicate derive(company_id = toInteger(company_id),
		source_system_id = case(iifNull(source_system_id,0)==0, toInteger(company_id) , toInteger(source_system_id)),
		source_system = case(iifNull(source_system,'NULL')=='NULL','SF', upper(source_system)),
		gard_market_area_code = substring(gard_market_area_code, 1, 10)) ~> Expression
Expression sink(input(
		primary_contact_name as string,
		account_resp_me as string,
		gard_market_area_code as string,
		source_system as string,
		account_resp_pi as string,
		gard_market_area_desc as string,
		account_status as string,
		primary_contact_email as string,
		client_lost_reason as string,
		gard_contact_id as string,
		source_system_id as long,
		company_email as string,
		company_owner_full_name as string,
		company_id as long,
		parent_company_id as long,
		company_name as string,
		company_record_type as string,
		parent_company_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		primary_contact_name,
		account_resp_me,
		gard_market_area_code,
		source_system,
		account_resp_pi,
		gard_market_area_desc = market_area_description,
		account_status,
		primary_contact_email,
		client_lost_reason,
		gard_contact_id,
		source_system_id,
		company_email,
		company_owner_full_name,
		company_id,
		parent_company_id,
		company_name,
		parent_company_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SfCompany
